alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:23PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Lucie and southeastern Indian River Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 323 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lakewood Park, or near Indrio, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Vero Beach, Indian River Shores, Vero Beach South and Gifford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie
